songs.album: The Blue M&M Vol 2 King Size
songs.title: Deja Vu
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Oooooohh
Boot sack and a big blunt of fruit
The bitch dropped her top when she sat in the coupe
Ooh the bitch dropped her top when she sat in the coupe
(dj drama fuck these niggas up)
Boot sec in a big blunt of fruit
The bitch drop the top when she sat in the coupe
Double o that ho sit at the carlo of the roof
Bizarre everything, 40 pointers to my Louboutin's
Safari Jumanji, got Louboutin futons
Thots and Kardashian's, what type of bitch that you on
Free Kwony Cash these niggas still peon's
Skkrt! Load this bitch down in the neon
Deuce Bigalow kept the pack like im Dion
Deja vu bitches, this right here a re-run
Adam Sandler diamonds on my bitch, water boy
Skrrt skrrt go out the Bentley like im Florida boy
That boy right there one button and the doors will jump
Big C, triple C thats from Florida boy
Dude kick the door like it's extortion
Money pounds, and ammunition bandcamp (longway bitch)

[Hook:]
Whip it right out the bowl
Fish-scaling out the spot, put it right around the roll
Drop the top and let it blow hey
Yellow bone hair blowin in the double R
I got rich off the road bae
Smokin OG and im smokin cigar
Deja vu (deja vu)
I'm havin deja vu (im havin deja vu)
She want that coupe baby (She want that coupe baby)
I'm havin deja vu (im havin deja vu)
She want that coupe baby (She want that coupe baby)
She havin deja vu-uu (She havin deja vu-u)
She can't wait to get loose baby (She can't wait to get loose baby)
She havin deja vu (she havin deja vu)
She wanna fuck me on the blue baby (blue baby)
We havin deja vu-uu

[Verse 2]
Got my bitch stepping in armadillo heels
Louis Vuittons off in the hundred hundred mill
Trap spot beatin gas bags on the hill
James Bond iTunes did a hunnit mill
Add it up
Trappin" and dab em up
Gas bags the Bentley truck
We sticking up sitting ducks
MC I kill em bruh
DK go pick em up
I'm havin Deja Vu-uu
She want that coupe baby (coupe baby)
I got bitches like Uncle Luke
That be trappin that Cali bud
I don't want no scrub a scrub is a bitch can't get no love from wee
We pullin up with choppas hold a hunna
Fuckin on a bitch like I'm Brian Pump
I'm a dog, I'm a dog
Fuckin on her mama
Free the Wop!
Show em how to stretch a du wap
Tryna pass me a hoo-kah
Longway smokin on bazoo-ka
Tryna press a C, everywhere I'm a deuce
Longway pullin up in  a coupe
African diamonds you see em through the panoramic
Choppers flashin like a camera
Wanna fuck me on the roof
She wanna fuck me on the roof

[Hook:]
Whip it right out the bowl
Fish-scaling out the spot, put it right around the roll
Drop the top and let it blow hey
Yellow bone hair blowin in the double lo
I got rich off the road bae
Smokin OG and im smokin cigar
Deja vu (deja vu)
I'm havin deja vu (im havin deja vu)
She want that coupe baby (She want that coupe baby)
I'm havin deja vu (im havin deja vu)
She want that coupe baby (She want that coupe baby)
She havin deja vu-uu (She havin deja vu-u)
She can't wait to get loose baby (She can't wait to get loose baby)
She havin deja vu (she havin deja vu)
She wanna fuck me on the blue baby (blue baby)
We havin deja vu-uu
